Welcome to Mommys!

A client for e621/e926.

To report problems or send feedback, use the Send feedback button below.
Input the page to go to (1–750)\nCurrent: %1$d\nLast: %2$d
Input the username or user id of the user to go to
Failed to fetch profile\nCheck your internet connection and try again
Enter your username and API key to access your account

Enter your API key (not your password!) and login to e621.

Don't have an API key yet? Follow these steps:
 1. Login and go to https://e621.net/users/home
 2. Click on "Manage API Access"
 3. Re-enter your password and click Submit
 4. Generate an API key and copy it
 5. Use this API key together with your username to login to the app
Login with your e926 account to access all features
No compatible browser found. The URL was copied to the clipboard.
You need to be logged in to view this post
You need to be logged in to vote
Grant the notification permission to receive notifications!
Download started! Check the notification for progress.
Shows a notification while downloading posts
Set a four-digit pin code that needs to be entered when launching the app.
Posts matching a line in the blacklist will be hidden

Put a tag you want to blacklist on its own line. Example:
 male
 horse
 fox

 This will hide all posts with the entered tags. ALL male posts, ALL posts with a horse, and ALL fox posts will be hidden.

 You can also combine tags on a line. Example:
 female fox solo
 male wolf outside
 Each line is regarded separately so posts with ALL the tags on a given line will be hidden, but each line will be matched individually.

 You can also blacklist a tag only if the post also contains another tag by using a minus sign. Example:
 female -solo
 This will hide all female posts that are NOT solo.
An error occurred. Please try again.

Do you want the exported file to be encrypted? (prevents other apps and users from reading its contents)

Version 1.0.0 - 2026-01-14 • Initial release • Browse posts with grid and staggered layouts • Search with tag autocomplete • View post details with zoom and pan • Download posts to device • Login with e621/e926 account • Favorite and vote on posts • View and browse pools • Browse tags with categories • View user profiles • Blacklist management • Saved searches • Following tags • Download manager • PIN code lock • Dark and light themes ----------------------------------- Coming Soon • Sets management • Wiki pages • Comments • Edit posts • And more!
